summary: Most startup-flow requirements appear implemented via new non-blocking actor hook (useSafeActor), a startup gate with timeout and retry (useStartupGate), and a dedicated error screen; however, the runtime Internet Identity URL injection (process.env.II_URL via index.html) is not evidenced in the diff. The diff summary also suggests unrelated new/expanded UI features (e.g., navigation entries, dashboards/tools) that are outside the stated non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the Internet Identity provider URL is reliably available at runtime as process.env.II_URL (exact value https://identity.ic0.app/#authorize) by setting window.process.env.II_URL in frontend/index.html.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to frontend/index.html (or any runtime env injection) are shown in the diff summary, so the required runtime definition of window.process.env.II_URL is not evidenced.
evidence: File diff summary shows no modified/added frontend/index.html

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed navigation item "About Me" in the app shell navigation.
hallucinated_features.reason: This is a new product feature unrelated to fixing startup/loading and is explicitly outside the scope (non-goals).

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard enhancements including KPIs/analytics/charts and a chatbot.
hallucinated_features.reason: This constitutes new dashboard modules/features, which are listed as non-goals unrelated to fixing startup/loading.
